testcase.name: Create new faker user
testcase.system-out: * def baseUrl = 'https://www.krafttechexlab.com/sw/api/v1/allusers' ....... passed * def userGenerator = Java.type('utilities.NewUserDataGenerator') ......... passed * def NewUser = userGenerator.userDataGenerator() ......................... passed * print NewUser ........................................................... passed Given url baseUrl ......................................................... passed * path 'Register' ......................................................... passed And header Accept = 'application/json; charset=UTF-8' ..................... passed And header Content-Type = 'application/json; charset=UTF-8' ............... passed And request NewUser ....................................................... passed When method POST .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print response .......................................................... passed * match response.name == NewUser.name ..................................... passed * print response.token .................................................... passed * def token = response.token .............................................. passed
